archimate:TechnologyService.name: Streaming Ingestion Service
archimate:TechnologyService.documentation:
Supervisors are for long-running streaming ingestion (Kafka, Kinesis) while tasks are for once-off ingestion (HDFS, S3)
Submit work https://druid.apache.org/docs/latest/operations/api-reference.html#post-4 POST /druid/indexer/v1/task GET /druid/indexer/v1/supervisor/history GET /druid/indexer/v1/supervisor/<supervisorId>/history
What's going on overall? https://druid.apache.org/docs/latest/operations/api-reference.html#get-15 GET /druid/indexer/v1/supervisor GET /druid/indexer/v1/supervisor?full GET /druid/indexer/v1/supervisor?state=true
How is one item of work going? https://druid.apache.org/docs/latest/operations/api-reference.html#get-15 GET /druid/indexer/v1/supervisor/<supervisorId>/status
What's it actually working on? https://druid.apache.org/docs/latest/operations/api-reference.html#get-15 GET /druid/indexer/v1/supervisor/<supervisorId>
What was the result of one supervisor?
Control work
Pause https://druid.apache.org/docs/latest/operations/api-reference.html#post-5 POST /druid/indexer/v1/supervisor/{supervisorId}/suspend POST /druid/indexer/v1/supervisor/suspendAll
Resume https://druid.apache.org/docs/latest/operations/api-reference.html#post-5 POST /druid/indexer/v1/supervisor/<supervisorId>/resume POST /druid/indexer/v1/supervisor/resumeAll
Reset https://druid.apache.org/docs/latest/operations/api-reference.html#post-5 POST /druid/indexer/v1/supervisor/<supervisorId>/reset
Stop https://druid.apache.org/docs/latest/operations/api-reference.html#post-5 /druid/indexer/v1/supervisor/<supervisorId>/terminate /druid/indexer/v1/supervisor/terminateAll
